DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis chemotherapy irinotecan gemcitabine improve local control cancer prolong survival patient inoperable biliary tract cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Irinotecan , Gemcitabine , Chemotherapy Biliary Tract Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm inoperable biliary tract cancer Age : 18 ~75 year old Performance status : ECOG 02 Hematopoietic : Granulocyte count least 1,500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin No great 2 fold upper normal limit AST/ALT : No great 3 fold upper normal limit Renal : Creatinine great 1.5 mg/dL Not pregnant No serious medical psychiatric illness would preclude give informed consent limit No prior chemotherapy within 6 month No concurrent anticancer radiotherapy within 6 month
